FILE: cm235850v11.0.txt
DYAD: PORTUGAL - INDONESIA
RIVALRY: RIV650
DISPUTE(S): MID1450 


PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20171223
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20171224


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID1450 

TERRMID: MID1450 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID1450 from (Gibler 2018), there was an ongoing civil war in Portuguese East Timor, a Portuguese colony in Indonesia that was claimed by Indonesia. Indonesia tried to play a large role in international peacekeeping, and Portugal disliked this. Indonesia then invaded East Timor and said they were restoring order, and Portugal broke diplomatic relations. Portugal sent a naval force. The dispute ended via an agreement that awarded Indonesia control over East Timor. Coded territorial MID because this dispute involved Indonesia pressing their claim on East Timor.

TERRLINK: MID1450 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1450 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1450 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1450 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID1450 coded civil war MID because there was an ongoing civil war in East Timor that contributed to the events of this MID, and Indonesian forces also attacked rebels in East Timor. 

CIVWARLINK: MID1450 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1450 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1450 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1450 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
